G

Game - Class in GameEngine
This class holds the basic components for running a game.
Game(int) - Constructor for class GameEngine.Game
Basic game constructor
Game.GameDrawer - Class in GameEngine
This class is your interface to the OpenGL rendering capabilities.
Game.GameInputInterface - Class in GameEngine
This class is the interface to Java's Key and mouse input listeners.
Game.ResourceLoader - Class in GameEngine
This class is purely used to call the load() method for loading GameTextures and loadFont() for initilising fonts that will be used in the game.
GameCanvas - Class in GameEngine
This class is like the normal Canvas except is has Game attached to it and will run and render that game in it's drawing area.
GameCanvas(Game) - Constructor for class GameEngine.GameCanvas
Standard Constructor
GameEngine - package GameEngine
 
GameFont - Class in GameEngine
Holds the information required for the GameDrawer to draw text to the screen.
